game.title: Axe of the Ancients: Dwarven Fury
game.description: Axe of the Ancients: Dwarven Fury is an epic action hack-and-slash adventure, blending stunning visuals with classic gameplay inspired by Warcraft and Golden Axe. Step into the boots of Thorgar, a mighty dwarven warrior on a quest for revenge.
game.instructions: Left mouse button - Attack, Right mouse button - Lock on enemy, WASD keys - Move, Spacebar - Jump, SHIFT - Run, E - Strong attack, Q - Roll, P - Pause

game.title: Revenge and Justice
game.description: Revenge and Justice is a gripping tale of vengeance, survival, and redemption in a world ravaged by destruction. Step into the role of a lone survivor seeking justice against those who destroyed everything.
game.instructions: Mouse - Shooting, WASD keys - Move, Spacebar - Jump, SHIFT - Run, R - Reload, Q - Roll, P - Pause

game.title: Vortex 9
game.description: Navigate through the spinning vortex in this challenging arcade game. Test your reflexes and timing as you avoid obstacles and collect power-ups.
game.instructions: Use arrow keys or WASD to move. Avoid obstacles and survive as long as possible.

game.title: Fortzone Battle Royale
game.description: Join the battle royale action in this fast-paced multiplayer survival game. Build, fight, and be the last one standing!
game.instructions: WASD to move, left click to shoot, right click to build, spacebar to jump.

game.title: Cubox IO
game.description: Grow your cube by collecting smaller cubes and dominate the arena in this multiplayer IO game.
game.instructions: Move your mouse to control your cube. Absorb smaller cubes to grow larger.

game.title: The Island Survival
game.description: Stranded on a mysterious island, you must gather resources, craft tools, and build shelter to survive.
game.instructions: WASD to move, E to interact, left click to attack/break, right click to place/build.

game.title: Monster Master
game.description: Capture, train and evolve monsters to build the ultimate team in this monster-collecting RPG adventure.
game.instructions: Use arrow keys to move, Z to interact, X to open menu. Follow in-game tutorials for more advanced controls.

game.title: Rayman Incrediballs Dodge
game.description: Help Rayman dodge obstacles and collect Incrediballs in this exciting endless runner game.
game.instructions: Use arrow keys or swipe to move between lanes. Jump over obstacles and collect power-ups.

game.title: Nugget Royale IO
game.description: Battle other players in this fast-paced multiplayer arena. Collect nuggets, upgrade your character, and be the last one standing!
game.instructions: WASD to move, left click to shoot. Collect nuggets to upgrade your character.

game.title: Squid Game Multiplayer
game.description: Compete in deadly challenges inspired by the hit TV show. Can you survive all the games and claim the prize?
game.instructions: Controls vary by mini-game. Follow on-screen instructions to survive each challenge.

game.title: Obby Hide and Seek Battle Royale
game.description: Hide from seekers or hunt down hiders in this exciting multiplayer obstacle course game.
game.instructions: WASD to move, spacebar to jump. Hide from seekers or find hiders depending on your role.

game.title: Obby Pull a Sword
game.description: Navigate challenging obstacle courses to pull legendary swords and unlock new powers and abilities.
game.instructions: WASD to move, spacebar to jump. Reach the sword at the end of each level.

game.title: Path of Survivor
game.description: Survive waves of enemies in this top-down action game. Upgrade your abilities and see how long you can last.
game.instructions: WASD or arrow keys to move. Automatically attack nearby enemies. Collect XP to level up and choose upgrades.

game.title: Horror Farm Pumpkinhead
game.description: Explore a creepy farm at night in this first-person horror game. Collect items and uncover the mystery of Pumpkinhead.
game.instructions: WASD to move, shift to run, left click to interact. Find key items to progress and avoid the creature.

game.title: Sigma Boy
game.description: Embark on an epic journey as the legendary Sigma Boy. Run, jump, and fight through challenging levels in this action platformer.
game.instructions: Arrow keys to move, Z to jump, X to attack. Collect power-ups to enhance your abilities.

game.title: Nightclub Security Guard
game.description: Take on the role of a nightclub security guard and maintain order. Check IDs, break up fights, and keep the club running smoothly.
game.instructions: Click on characters to interact. Follow on-screen prompts to check IDs and handle situations.

game.title: Brawl Stars Battle Starr
game.description: Fight in fast-paced 3v3 battles with a variety of colorful characters, each with unique abilities.
game.instructions: Touch to move, drag to aim and shoot. Use your special ability when charged.

game.title: Wizard Masters
game.description: Master the arcane arts in this magical action game. Cast spells, defeat enemies, and become the ultimate wizard.
game.instructions: WASD to move, left click to cast basic spell, 1-4 keys for special spells. Defeat enemies to level up.

game.title: Roblox Squid Game Tower
game.description: Climb the dangerous tower and complete challenges inspired by the popular Squid Game series.
game.instructions: WASD to move, spacebar to jump. Complete each floor challenge to advance.

game.title: Traffic Jam 3D
game.description: Solve puzzling traffic scenarios by moving cars and clearing the way in this brain-teasing puzzle game.
game.instructions: Click and drag cars to move them. Clear the path for the red car to exit.

game.title: Squid Game 2 Mini Games
game.description: Test your skills in a series of mini-games inspired by the second season of the hit show.
game.instructions: Controls vary by mini-game. Follow on-screen instructions for each challenge.

game.title: Hungry Shark Arena Horror Night
game.description: Control a ferocious shark in this spooky underwater adventure. Eat everything in your path and grow larger in this horror-themed shark game.
game.instructions: Use arrow keys or WASD to swim. Eat smaller creatures to grow and avoid larger predators.
